scripts.bundle:scripts: NODE_PATH=src browserify src/client.js -o dist/public/bundle.js -t babelify -t envify
scripts.bundle:scripts:watch: NODE_PATH=src watchify src/client.js -o dist/public/bundle.js -v -t babelify -t envify --debug
scripts.build:scripts: npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && npm run bundle:scripts
scripts.watch:scripts: npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run compile:scripts:watch & npm run copy:files:watch & npm run bundle:scripts:watch)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run bundle:scripts & npm run build:styles)
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run compile:scripts:watch & npm run copy:files:watch & npm run bundle:scripts:watch & npm run watch:styles)
scripts.application: NODE_ENV=development npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run bundle:scripts & npm run build:styles & npm run server)
scripts.development: NODE_ENV=development npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run compile:scripts:watch & npm run copy:files:watch & npm run bundle:scripts:watch & npm run watch:styles & npm run server:watch)
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npm run compile:scripts && npm run copy:files && (npm run bundle:scripts & npm run build:styles & npm run server)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:scripts && npm run lint:styles
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:scripts:fix && npm run lint:styles
